name: Lance A Lot: Enhanced Edition
description:
Lance A Lot is a glorious, fast paced local multiplayer for up to four players! Settle rivalries as you joust against your friends across 8 maps and become the last knight standing!Glorious Features
  • Use your lance for one-hit kills! Destroy your opponents with the tip of your lance, or fire it as a missile to skewer them from a distance!
  • Smite opponents with your Rocket Hammer! Send them flying out of the arena or bash them into spiky thorns!
  • Interact with your environment! Hit explosive barrels or throw a holy hand grenade to explode them on impact! Bounce off of tents and even smash any tree in your path!
  • Change your playstyle with 4 different game modes and 6 different rulesets. Fight over territory in King of the Hill or knock each other out of the air in Sumo!
Major Changes From Classic EditionLance A Lot: Enhanced Edition is a complete standalone from the original Classic version. Many distinct changes have been made to improve the overall gameplay and provides much more content than the original.

  • Complete graphics overhaul that includes remade UI and menus, redesigned knights, and a new player character - The Forest Guardian.
  • Fight on 8 completely new maps!
  • Play solo with AI’s, or add them to a round with your friends!
  • Fire and pick up lances with an increased movement speed. Knights now wield a Rocket Hammer to bash opponents, objects, or swing it for a light dash!
  • Increased player speed and maneuverability. Players can now move in reverse.
